properties.formula_expression:
lets(
  outcome, {{notion:block_property:_~zk:00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}.at(0).{{notion:block_property:tDPO:2f2d8928-02b6-81f0-8d7c-ebba1e830552:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}},

  ),
  total.map(current.{{notion:block_property:xlVt:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}).sum()

  outcome, {{notion:block_property:_~zk:00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}.at(0).{{notion:block_property:tDPO:2f2d8928-02b6-81f0-8d7c-ebba1e830552:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}},
  y, replaceAll(format({{notion:block_property:hyQt:00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}.at(0)), "[^0-9]", ""),
  m, 9,
  ym, y + if(m < 10, "0" + format(m), format(m)),
  total, outcome.filter(
    formatDate(current.{{notion:block_property:%5CFpc:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}, "YYYYMM") == ym
    and current.{{notion:block_property:yFUG:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}} == {{notion:block_property:title:00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}
  ),
  total.map(current.{{notion:block_property:xlVt:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}).sum()
)

properties.formula_expression:
lets(
  outcome, {{notion:block_property:_~zk:00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}.at(0).{{notion:block_property:tDPO:2f2d8928-02b6-81f0-8d7c-ebba1e830552:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}},
  y, replaceAll(format({{notion:block_property:hyQt:00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}.at(0)), "[^0-9]", ""),
  mNum, toNumber(replaceAll(format({{notion:block_property:elgH:00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}.at(0)), "[^0-9]", "")),
  mText, if(mNum == 0, "", if(mNum < 10, "0" + format(mNum), format(mNum))),
  budget, if(empty({{notion:block_property:S%60rk:00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}), 0, {{notion:block_property:S%60rk:00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}),
  bar, style("ã€€", {{notion:block_property:J%5BfD:00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}),
  scale, 10,

  ym, y + "-" + mText,
  febYm, y + "-02",
  monthStart, parseDate(ym + "-01"),
  offsetSun, if(toNumber(formatDate(monthStart, "E")) == 7, 0, toNumber(formatDate(monthStart, "E"))),
  week0StartM, dateSubtract(monthStart, offsetSun, "days"),
  nextMonthStart, dateAdd(monthStart, 1, "months"),
  monthEnd, dateSubtract(nextMonthStart, 1, "days"),
  weekCount, floor(dateBetween(monthEnd, week0StartM, "days") / 7) + 1,

  w1, outcome.filter(
    formatDate(current.{{notion:block_property:%5CFpc:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}, "YYYY-MM") == ym
    and current.{{notion:block_property:yFUG:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}} == {{notion:block_property:title:00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}
    and lets(
      d, current.{{notion:block_property:%5CFpc:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}},
      monthStartD, dateSubtract(d, toNumber(formatDate(d, "D")) - 1, "days"),
      offsetSunD, if(toNumber(formatDate(monthStartD, "E")) == 7, 0, toNumber(formatDate(monthStartD, "E"))),
      week0Start, dateSubtract(monthStartD, offsetSunD, "days"),
      floor(dateBetween(d, week0Start, "days") / 7) + 1
    ) == 1
  ).map(current.{{notion:block_property:xlVt:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}).sum(),

  w2, outcome.filter(
    formatDate(current.{{notion:block_property:%5CFpc:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}, "YYYY-MM") == ym
    and current.{{notion:block_property:yFUG:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}} == {{notion:block_property:title:00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}
    and lets(
      d, current.{{notion:block_property:%5CFpc:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}},
      monthStartD, dateSubtract(d, toNumber(formatDate(d, "D")) - 1, "days"),
      offsetSunD, if(toNumber(formatDate(monthStartD, "E")) == 7, 0, toNumber(formatDate(monthStartD, "E"))),
      week0Start, dateSubtract(monthStartD, offsetSunD, "days"),
      floor(dateBetween(d, week0Start, "days") / 7) + 1
    ) == 2
  ).map(current.{{notion:block_property:xlVt:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}).sum(),

  w3, outcome.filter(
    formatDate(current.{{notion:block_property:%5CFpc:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}, "YYYY-MM") == ym
    and current.{{notion:block_property:yFUG:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}} == {{notion:block_property:title:00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}
    and lets(
      d, current.{{notion:block_property:%5CFpc:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}},
      monthStartD, dateSubtract(d, toNumber(formatDate(d, "D")) - 1, "days"),
      offsetSunD, if(toNumber(formatDate(monthStartD, "E")) == 7, 0, toNumber(formatDate(monthStartD, "E"))),
      week0Start, dateSubtract(monthStartD, offsetSunD, "days"),
      floor(dateBetween(d, week0Start, "days") / 7) + 1
    ) == 3
  ).map(current.{{notion:block_property:xlVt:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}).sum(),

  w4, outcome.filter(
    formatDate(current.{{notion:block_property:%5CFpc:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}, "YYYY-MM") == ym
    and current.{{notion:block_property:yFUG:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}} == {{notion:block_property:title:00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}
    and lets(
      d, current.{{notion:block_property:%5CFpc:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}},
      monthStartD, dateSubtract(d, toNumber(formatDate(d, "D")) - 1, "days"),
      offsetSunD, if(toNumber(formatDate(monthStartD, "E")) == 7, 0, toNumber(formatDate(monthStartD, "E"))),
      week0Start, dateSubtract(monthStartD, offsetSunD, "days"),
      floor(dateBetween(d, week0Start, "days") / 7) + 1
    ) == 4
  ).map(current.{{notion:block_property:xlVt:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}).sum(),

  w5, outcome.filter(
    formatDate(current.{{notion:block_property:%5CFpc:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}, "YYYY-MM") == ym
    and current.{{notion:block_property:yFUG:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}} == {{notion:block_property:title:00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}
    and lets(
      d, current.{{notion:block_property:%5CFpc:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}},
      monthStartD, dateSubtract(d, toNumber(formatDate(d, "D")) - 1, "days"),
      offsetSunD, if(toNumber(formatDate(monthStartD, "E")) == 7, 0, toNumber(formatDate(monthStartD, "E"))),
      week0Start, dateSubtract(monthStartD, offsetSunD, "days"),
      floor(dateBetween(d, week0Start, "days") / 7) + 1
    ) == 5
  ).map(current.{{notion:block_property:xlVt:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}).sum(),

  w6, outcome.filter(
    formatDate(current.{{notion:block_property:%5CFpc:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}, "YYYY-MM") == ym
    and current.{{notion:block_property:yFUG:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}} == {{notion:block_property:title:00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}
    and lets(
      d, current.{{notion:block_property:%5CFpc:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}},
      monthStartD, dateSubtract(d, toNumber(formatDate(d, "D")) - 1, "days"),
      offsetSunD, if(toNumber(formatDate(monthStartD, "E")) == 7, 0, toNumber(formatDate(monthStartD, "E"))),
      week0Start, dateSubtract(monthStartD, offsetSunD, "days"),
      floor(dateBetween(d, week0Start, "days") / 7) + 1
    ) == 6
  ).map(current.{{notion:block_property:xlVt:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}).sum(),

  febW1, if(
    mNum == 1,
    outcome.filter(
      formatDate(current.{{notion:block_property:%5CFpc:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}, "YYYY-MM") == febYm
      and current.{{notion:block_property:yFUG:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}} == {{notion:block_property:title:00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}
      and lets(
        d, current.{{notion:block_property:%5CFpc:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}},
        monthStartD, dateSubtract(d, toNumber(formatDate(d, "D")) - 1, "days"),
        offsetSunD, if(toNumber(formatDate(monthStartD, "E")) == 7, 0, toNumber(formatDate(monthStartD, "E"))),
        week0Start, dateSubtract(monthStartD, offsetSunD, "days"),
        floor(dateBetween(d, week0Start, "days") / 7) + 1
      ) == 1
    ).map(current.{{notion:block_property:xlVt:2f2d8928-02b6-8126-8d37-e1ebd985d759:cdc5a971-a08d-4e2e-bdb1-d57c7d4d4f45}}).sum(),
    0
  ),

  w4Adj, if(mNum == 1 and weekCount == 4, w4 + febW1, w4),
  w5Adj, if(mNum == 1 and weekCount == 5, w5 + febW1, w5),
  w6Adj, if(mNum == 1 and weekCount == 6, w6 + febW1, w6),

  r1, budget - w1,
  r2, budget - w2,
  r3, budget - w3,
  r4, budget - w4Adj,
  r5, budget - w5Adj,
  r6, budget - w6Adj,

  a1, if(r1 < 0, 0, r1),
  a2, if(r2 < 0, 0, r2),
  a3, if(r3 < 0, 0, r3),
  a4, if(r4 < 0, 0, r4),
  a5, if(r5 < 0, 0, r5),
  a6, if(r6 < 0, 0, r6),

  d1, floor(a1 / 5000),
  d2, floor(a2 / 5000),
  d3, floor(a3 / 5000),
  d4, floor(a4 / 5000),
  d5, floor(a5 / 5000),
  d6, floor(a6 / 5000),

  t1, if(a1 == 0, 0, ceil((a1 - d1 * 5000) / 500)),
  t2, if(a2 == 0, 0, ceil((a2 - d2 * 5000) / 500)),
  t3, if(a3 == 0, 0, ceil((a3 - d3 * 5000) / 500)),
  t4, if(a4 == 0, 0, ceil((a4 - d4 * 5000) / 500)),
  t5, if(a5 == 0, 0, ceil((a5 - d5 * 5000) / 500)),
  t6, if(a6 == 0, 0, ceil((a6 - d6 * 5000) / 500)),

  s1, if(budget <= 0, 0, if(a1 / budget >= 1, scale, ceil(a1 / budget * scale))),
  s2, if(budget <= 0, 0, if(a2 / budget >= 1, scale, ceil(a2 / budget * scale))),
  s3, if(budget <= 0, 0, if(a3 / budget >= 1, scale, ceil(a3 / budget * scale))),
  s4, if(budget <= 0, 0, if(a4 / budget >= 1, scale, ceil(a4 / budget * scale))),
  s5, if(budget <= 0, 0, if(a5 / budget >= 1, scale, ceil(a5 / budget * scale))),
  s6, if(budget <= 0, 0, if(a6 / budget >= 1, scale, ceil(a6 / budget * scale))),

  lines, [
    if(weekCount >= 1, "W1  æ®‹ğŸŸï¸" + format(t1) + "  ğŸ’" + format(d1) + "  " + repeat(bar, s1), ""),
    if(weekCount >= 2, "W2  æ®‹ğŸŸï¸" + format(t2) + "  ğŸ’" + format(d2) + "  " + repeat(bar, s2), ""),
    if(weekCount >= 3, "W3  æ®‹ğŸŸï¸" + format(t3) + "  ğŸ’" + format(d3) + "  " + repeat(bar, s3), ""),
    if(weekCount >= 4, "W4  æ®‹ğŸŸï¸" + format(t4) + "  ğŸ’" + format(d4) + "  " + repeat(bar, s4), ""),
    if(weekCount >= 5, "W5  æ®‹ğŸŸï¸" + format(t5) + "  ğŸ’" + format(d5) + "  " + repeat(bar, s5), ""),
    if(weekCount >= 6, "W6  æ®‹ğŸŸï¸" + format(t6) + "  ğŸ’" + format(d6) + "  " + repeat(bar, s6), "")
  ].filter(current != ""),

  if(
    empty(y) or mNum == 0,
    "",
    join(lines, "\n")
  )
)
